Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.chat

Class Chat

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.chat.Chat
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChatModel
public class Chat extends Object implements ChatModel
Class used to handle the receiving and sending of chat messages.

  • Constructor Details

    • Chat

      public Chat(String username)
      Creates a new chat for the player with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.

    • Chat

      private Chat(String username, List<ChatMessage> messages)
      Reconstructs a chat from the given attributes. Used for JSON deserializing.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player who this chat belongs to.
      messages - The messages present in this chat.

  • Method Details

    • getUsername

      public String getUsername()
      Returns:
      The player who this chat belongs to.

    • subscribe

      public void subscribe(ChatController chatController)
      Subscribes this chat to the given ChatController. This allows it to receive messages from the chat manager. This method overwrites the current chat manager if there is one.
      Parameters:
      chatController - The chat manager to subscribe this chat to.

    • unsubscribe

      public void unsubscribe()
      Unsubscribes this chat from its chat manager. This method does nothing if the chat is not subscribed to any chat manager.

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage(ChatMessage message)
      Description copied from interface: ChatModel
      Adds the given message to the chat's list of received messages.
      Specified by:
      receiveMessage in interface ChatModel
      Parameters:
      message - The message to add.

    • getMessages

      public List<ChatMessage> getMessages()
      Specified by:

      Returns:
      The chat's list of received and sent messages.
